WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE Username Specifed Without a Password

Your request for the URL
$decurl
specified the username $user but no password.

Help

The WWWOFFLE server can fetch web pages that require a username and password if the username and password are provided to WWWOFFLE. This request specified a username but no password and WWWOFFLE cannot continue to process it.
